# System-level requirements for HAFiscal

# Operating System
# - Unix-like systems (Linux, macOS, BSD)
# - Tested on: macOS 10.15+ (darwin 24.4.0)
# - Linux: Ubuntu 20.04+, CentOS 7+, RHEL 7+
# - Windows: WSL2 recommended

# System packages (Ubuntu/Debian)
# sudo apt-get update
# sudo apt-get install -y texlive-full texlive-extra-utils texlive-science texlive-publishers python3.11 python3.11-dev

# System packages (CentOS/RHEL/Fedora)
# sudo yum install -y texlive-scheme-full python3.11 python3.11-devel
# # or for newer systems:
# sudo dnf install -y texlive-scheme-full python3.11 python3.11-devel

# System packages (macOS with Homebrew)
# brew install --cask mactex
# brew install python@3.11

# System packages (FreeBSD)
# pkg install texlive-full python311

# Minimum hardware requirements
# - RAM: 16GB (32GB+ recommended for full reproduction)
# - Storage: 5GB free space (for LaTeX distribution + data)
# - CPU: Modern multi-core processor (4+ cores recommended)

# Required software
# - Python 3.11.7
# - LaTeX distribution (TeX Live 2023+ or MiKTeX)
# - Stata MP/18.0+ (for empirical analysis)
# - Git (for version control)

# Optional but recommended
# - conda or miniconda (for Python environment management)
# - latexmk (for automated LaTeX compilation)
